resources.string: Enter OTP Sent To Your Phone

Our privacy policy at Learning Buddy underscores our commitment to safeguarding the privacy and security of our users\' personal information. As a study app designed to facilitate learning programming languages, we collect minimal data necessary to enhance user experience and provide personalized learning opportunities. This may include basic account information such as email addresses and usernames, as well as user-generated content such as study progress and preferences. Rest assured, we do not share this information with third parties for commercial purposes. Any data collected is used solely to improve our services, customize content, and ensure efficient app functionality. We employ industry-standard security measures to protect against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction of users\' personal information. By using Learning Buddy, users implicitly consent to the collection and use of their data in accordance with this privacy policy. We are committed to transparent communication regarding any updates or changes to our privacy practices, ensuring users remain informed and empowered regarding the handling of their personal information.
- Access granted for personal, non-commercial use only.
- Users expected to maintain respectful behavior and legal compliance.
- Content accuracy is not guaranteed by the app.
- Intellectual property rights are protected by the app.
- User data is kept confidential and secure.
- The app holds no liability for damages incurred.
- The app reserves the right to terminate accounts for violations of terms.
